attributes.action: Save Chase Farm Hospital A & E department
attributes.additional_details:
We desperately need to save A & E at Chase Farm Hospital, because if it's closed, lives will be lost due to the excessive burden on the remaining hospitals in and around Barnet.
Chase Farm hospital saved my life, and it's saved many others too!
Tell the government that instead of sending hundreds of millions to countries which have their own space programme, and oil producing nations which are, in fact, wealthier than us... that they should put the money into OUR OWN Health Service and other bare essentials.
CHARITY BEGINS AT HOME!
The government should take our health and lives into consideration BEFORE they sell off even more land and cut more essential services from Chase Farm Hospital.
Emergency patients are to be sent instead to Barnet, or North Middlesex University Hospital in Edmonton. Critics say these hospitals, which are already overstretched, WILL NOT cope with additional patients, and inevitably, lives will be lost.
Will this government's legacy include negligence?
